reviewtext: I got this charger along with a Garmin nüvi 855. The charger does what it says it does, and charges the GPS just fine. The only problem I have isn't really with the charger, but with the GPS. When the charging through the USB port like this charger does. The GPS stays powered on in "USB Connected Mode" the whole time. You can't turn it off, and so the screen, back-light, and maybe the GPS antenna are running while charging. Thus, increasing the time needed to charge.
summary: Charger works great, but Garmin stays in USP conneted mode.
